items.primaryImageAltText: RVCA That'll Do Oxford Shirt - Short-Sleeve - Men's
items.seoUrlSlugDerived: RVCA That'll Do Oxford Shirt - Short-Sleeve - Men's
items.longDescription:
Details

Being married to a dragon and having an ogre for a best friend means having to watch your tongue when holding down conversations with either of them. On the one end, you could be the recipient of a scorned woman's fire-breath, and on the other, you could be squashed flat by your ogre homie. Our advice? Put on the RVCA That'll Do Oxford Shirt and go kick it with that nice gingerbread kid down the street.
items.displayName: RVCA That'll Do Oxford Shirt - Short-Sleeve - Men's
items.primaryImageTitle: RVCA That'll Do Oxford Shirt - Short-Sleeve - Men's

items.primaryImageAltText: Basin and Range��_Wasatch 800 Hooded Down Jacket - Men's
items.seoUrlSlugDerived: Basin and Range��_Wasatch 800 Hooded Down Jacket - Men's
items.longDescription:
The Wasatch Range is capable of producing some bone-chilling temperatures, but those temps are often accompanied with great snow, and that's something we're OK with. When getting out in the mountains during the cold seasons, let the Basin and Range Wasatch 800 Fill Down Jacket warm your core. Its responsibly sourced 800-fill down insulation delivers on-demand warmth and is highly compressible, so you can stash it in your pack, without it taking up too much space. The environmentally friendly 20D recycled polyester fabric won't tear easily and is treated with a DWR finish, so you won't have to run for your shell at the first flurry of snow.

  • commerce360 Exclusive
  • 20D polyester taffeta (100% recycled)
  • DWR finish
  • Responsibly sourced 800-fill down insulation
  • Regular fit
  • Insulated hood
  • Zippered hand pockets
  • Item #BNG0001
items.displayName: Basin and Range��_Wasatch 800 Hooded Down Jacket - Men's
items.primaryImageTitle: Basin and Range��_Wasatch 800 Hooded Down Jacket - Men's

items.seoUrlSlugDerived: Brixton Bowery Flannel Shirt - Long-Sleeve - Men's
items.longDescription:
• Details

    Wrestle a camel while wearing your Brixton Bowery Flannel Shirt. Why a camel? Why not? Are you implying that it would be lame to wrestle a camel? How do you know until you toss on this comfortable cotton flannel, face off with the hump-back punk, and take him down? Camels could be scrappers for all we know.
